To create and then sign a transaction intended to deploy a contract you need to omit the destination address field
. The sign method expects this and will not validate against it.
: While all other wallet types allow you to pass in an empty
field (not that it would be very useful), Trezor requires you to specifically set it. So you won't be able to sign a contract deployment transaction without also setting the transaction data.
